metadata.synopsis: PAD about a door enveloped in some dark energy.Different comments depending on whether the player succeeded on an Arcana check or not.
metadata.how_to_trigger: goto -98; 46; 21the player character will make a passive check and play this AD.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: The door's covered in - well, some sort of magic.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: That door is saturated with necrotic magic. Best keep my distance.
